description:
Kotsuru, the daughter of a tea shop owner, has a friend, Gin-chan, who is moving away. She loves ice cream but hates green tea, so Kotsuru resolves to make her some green tea ice cream before she leaves.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Love Ice Cream / Vegetable Power
I 愛 アイス / ベジタブルパワー
